data.title: Jamie Lynn Spears and Casey Aldridge Call it Quits
data.meta_description: While Brad and Angelina seem to be going strong, Britney Spears' 18-year-old sister has reportedly split from her boyfriend, Casey Aldridge, the father of their 19-month-old daughter, Maddie.
data.text:
While Brad and Angelina seem to be going strong, Britney Spears' 18-year-old sister has reportedly split from her boyfriend, Casey Aldridge, the father of their 19-month-old daughter, Maddie.

Jamie Lynn and Aldridge were once rumored to be engaged, but a marriage never materialized. And now reports say that the former Zoey 101 star moved out of the house she and Aldridge shared.

"She did a lot of growing up but he didn't," says a source, according to People.com. "I think she put up with more than she cared to put up with. She just got enough of it and was tired of the situation."

But, Jamie Lynn proved that she isn't one to sit around and wallow in a broken heart—she may already have a new boyfriend!

People reports that the teen mom is dating a 28-year-old businessman. A friend close to the family claims that her new man "seems to be a nice guy."

While their age difference is pretty hefty, I think an older man might be good for her!

Do you think Jamie Lynn and Casey should try to work it out? Or is it better for her to move on?
